SELECT t.id, t.amount, t.frozen_amount AS frozenAmount, t.usable_amount AS usableAmount, t.`status`, t.customer_id AS customerId, t1.real_name AS realName, t1.customer_no AS customerNo, t1.merchant_id AS merchantId, t2.merchant_name AS merchantName, t.create_time AS createTime, t4.tax_sounrce_company_name AS taxSourceompanyName FROM tbl_customer_account t LEFT JOIN tbl_customer_info t1 ON t.customer_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN tbl_merchant_info t2 ON t1.merchant_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN tbl_online_customer_info t3 ON t1.id = t3.customer_id LEFT JOIN tbl_tax_sounrce_company t4 ON t4.id = t3.tax_source_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND t1.real_name LIKE concat('%', #{realName}, '%')
AND t2.merchant_name LIKE concat('%', #{merchantName}, '%')
and t.create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
ORDER BY t.create_time DESC
